tool_description: This API provides (User Management, Entity Manipulation, Short Message Service [only for Rwanda], Chat and Notofication) features.
name: Addax
title: Addax

api_list.name: createentity
api_list.description: This request is for creating an entity
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://addax.p.rapidapi.com/entity/create"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "addax.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://addax.p.rapidapi.com/entity/create"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "addax.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
